message.name: ERR_PROVIDERCATEGORY_XRV_CATAGORY_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A provider may not have the same Category %1c more than once for the same period, %2d - %3d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERCATEGORY_XRV_CATAGORY_ALREADY_EXISTS_AND_EXIST_CATAGORY_NOT_HAVE_ENDDATE
message.locale: A provider may not have the same Category %1c more than once for the same period, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERCATEGORY_XRV_STARTDATE_IS_LATER_THAN_ENROLLMENT_DATE
message.locale: The Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the Enrollment Date of the provider, %2d.
The Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the Enrolment Date of the provider, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERCATEGORY_XRV_STARTDATE_MUST_NOT_BE_LATER_THAN_ENDDATE_OF_PROVIDER
message.locale: The Start Date, %1d, must be on or before the End Date of the provider, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERCATEGORY_XRV_ENDDATE_MUST_NOT_BE_LATER_THAN_ENDDATE_OF_PROVIDER
message.locale: The End Date, %1d, must be on or before the End Date of the provider, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERCATEGORY_XRV_ENDDATE_MUST_NOT_BE_EARLIER_THAN_ENROLLMENTDATE_OF_PROVIDER
message.locale: The End Date, %1d, must be on or after the Enrollment Date of the provider, %2d.
The End Date, %1d, must be on or after the Enrolment Date of the provider, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERCATEGORY_XRV_ATLEAST_ONE_PROVIDER_TYPE_MUST_BE_EXIST
message.locale: At least one Provider Type must be selected.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERCATEGORY_XRV_CANNOT_DELETE_IF_PROVIDER_CATEGORY_IS_PRIMARY
message.locale: The primary category must not be deleted.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERCATEGORY_XFV_ENDDATE_MUST_NOT_BE_EARLIER_THAN_STARTDATE
message.locale: The End Date, %1d, must be on or after the Start Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERCATEGORY_XF_COMMENTS_ENTERED_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long (%1n) - maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERCATEGORY_XFV_END_REASON_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED_IF_ENDDATE_IS_SPECIFIED
message.locale: End Reason must be specified if End Date is specified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERCATEGORY_XFV_END_REASON_MUST_NOT_SPECIFIED_IF_ENDDATE_IS_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: End Reason must not be specified if End Date is not specified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERCATEGORY_XRV_PRIMARY_CATEGORY_CANNOT_MODIFY_IT_IS_NO_LONGER_PRIMARY
message.locale: The primary category cannot be modified so that it is no longer primary. Please select another category and make it the primary.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERCATEGORY_XRV_USER_MUST_BE_MEMBER_OF_ORG_OBJECT
message.locale: User, %1s, must be a member of the %2s to perform this task.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERCATEGORY_XRV_CATEGORY_MUST_EXIST
message.locale: Provider Category and Provider Type must be selected.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERCATEGORY_XRV_TYPE_DOES_NOT_BELONG_TO_CATEGORY
message.locale: Selected Provider Type does not belong to selected Provider Category.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERCATEGORY_XRV_DELETED_PROVIDER_CATEGORY_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED
message.locale: Deleted Provider Category cannot be updated.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERCATEGORY_XRV_START_DATE_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: Start Date of Provider Category not entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERCATEGORY_XRV_CATEGORY_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED
message.locale: The category cannot be updated, only the period of the category and the types related to it can be updated.
